title: CC-ui: OpenCode-Style UI Components
description: Build React components for chat, file explorer, diff viewer to provide full web IDE experience.

title: RED: ui-chat-test - Tests for Chat component
description:
Test message rendering
Test streaming message display
Test input handling
Test markdown rendering

title: GREEN: ui-session-impl - Implement SessionPanel
description:
List active sessions
Create new session dialog
Switch between sessions

title: REFACTOR: ui-theme - Theme and styling refinement
description:
Dark/light mode toggle
Consistent design tokens
Accessibility improvements

title: GREEN: ui-chat-impl - Implement Chat component
description:
Message list with virtual scrolling
Streaming message support
Input with submit handling
Markdown/code rendering

title: RED: ui-filetree-test - Tests for FileTree component
description:
Test directory expansion
Test file selection
Test lazy loading

title: GREEN: ui-filetree-impl - Implement FileTree component
description:
Tree structure rendering
Expand/collapse directories
File selection callback
Icon display by file type

title: RED: ui-diffviewer-test - Tests for DiffViewer component
description:
Test unified diff display
Test side-by-side mode
Test syntax highlighting

title: GREEN: ui-diffviewer-impl - Implement DiffViewer component
description:
Parse git diff format
Unified and split view modes
Line number display
Syntax highlighting

title: RED: ui-layout-test - Tests for IDE layout
description:
Test panel resizing
Test panel collapse
Test responsive behavior

title: GREEN: ui-layout-impl - Implement IDE layout
description:
Resizable panels (sidebar, main, terminal)
Panel collapse/expand
Responsive mobile layout

title: RED: ui-session-test - Tests for SessionPanel
description:
Test session list
Test session creation dialog
Test session switching
